articles.additionalContext: This article is aimed at home baristas and coffee enthusiasts who are learning how to fine-tune espresso recipes to achieve consistent, balanced shots. It walks readers through a methodical approach to dialing in espresso using sensory feedback, time measurements, and adjustment techniques related to grind size, tamping, and brew ratio. The tone is encouraging and precise, focusing on helping readers recognize cause-effect relationships in their brewing process.
